channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (12 Feb 2016)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-02-12/#comment-324">Jon Barratt</a>.
That's awesome Jon, pleased to hear it!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jon Barratt.

That’s awesome Jon, pleased to hear it!

item.title: By: Jon Barratt
item.dc:creator: Jon Barratt
item.description:
Thanks again for the mention, Nick. Incidentally, Multisite should be out this week. A few enquiries (since this guide) has put a rocket up my you-know-what :)
Cheers Jon
item.content:encoded:
Thanks again for the mention, Nick. Incidentally, Multisite should be out this week. A few enquiries (since this guide) has put a rocket up my you-know-what ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Nick Davis
item.dc:creator: Nick Davis
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://genesiswp.guide/2016-02-12/#comment-318">Dave Browne</a>.
Haha! I'll put you in the same 'always redesigning' category as Brian and Calvin then.
Look forward to seeing the new one (let us know @GenesisWPguide when it goes live and I'm sure it'll get featured again ;) )
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Dave Browne.

Haha! I’ll put you in the same ‘always redesigning’ category as Brian and Calvin then.

Look forward to seeing the new one (let us know @GenesisWPguide when it goes live and I’m sure it’ll get featured again ðŸ˜‰ )

item.title: By: Don Nelson
item.dc:creator: Don Nelson
item.description: Thanks for the mention. I sincerely appreciate it. It's nice to be listed along side so many great looking sites.
item.content:encoded: Thanks for the mention. I sincerely appreciate it. It’s nice to be listed along side so many great looking sites.

item.title: By: Dave Browne
item.dc:creator: Dave Browne
item.description:
Hey thanks for the mention! I'll be sure to thank Calvin also.
The funny thing is, I've already been working on rebranding and a new design to be released shortly. #obsessed ;)
item.content:encoded:
Hey thanks for the mention! I’ll be sure to thank Calvin also.

The funny thing is, I’ve already been working on rebranding and a new design to be released shortly. #obsessed ðŸ˜‰

item.description: Fantastic stuff happening out there. Loving the new themes!
item.content:encoded: Fantastic stuff happening out there. Loving the new themes!
